com.agorapulse.gru.minions

Class AbstractMinion<C extends Client>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.agorapulse.gru.minions.AbstractMinion<C>
  • Type Parameters:
    C - type of the client
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Minion
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractContentMinion, ControllerInitializationMinion, CookieMinion, HttpMinion, MultipartMinion, ParametersMinion, PayloadMinion, RequestBuilderMinion, ResultMatcherMinion

    public abstract class AbstractMinion<C extends Client>
extends Object
implements Minion
    Abstract class which stubs every method except Minion#getOrder() so subclasses may only implement the ones they are interested in.

    • Method Detail

      • beforeRun

        public final GruContext beforeRun(Client client,
                                  Squad squad,
                                  GruContext context)
        Description copied from interface: Minion
        Prepares the execution of controller action.
        Specified by:
        beforeRun in interface Minion
        Parameters:
        client - controller unit test
        squad - minion's colleagues
        context - context of execution, in this phase you should only add errors if some conditions are not met
        Returns:
        new context holding any exception which happens during the preparation or the initial context from parameter

      • afterRun

        public final GruContext afterRun(Client client,
                                 Squad squad,
                                 GruContext context)
        Description copied from interface: Minion
        Modifies the result of the execution of controller action. Minions handle the result in reversed order.
        Specified by:
        afterRun in interface Minion
        Parameters:
        client - controller unit test
        squad - minion's colleagues
        context - context of execution, in this phase can modify the result or add exception
        Returns:
        modified context or the initial one from the parameter

      • verify

        public final void verify(Client client,
                         Squad squad,
                         GruContext context)
                  throws Throwable
        Description copied from interface: Minion
        Verifies the response after execution of the controller action.
        Specified by:
        verify in interface Minion
        Parameters:
        client - controller unit test
        squad - minion's colleagues
        context - context of the execution, in this phase you can't modify the context, you can just throw any Throwable based on the current context state
        Throws:
        Throwable - if any of the conditions are not met
